requirements.summary: Update the Elite tier price display on the PricingPage to show $99 (per month) instead of the current incorrect price
acceptanceCriteria: The Elite tier card on the pricing page displays '$99' as its price.
No other tier prices are changed.
The price label is consistent with the existing formatting style used for other tiers.

file_operations.description: Update the Elite tier price display from its current value to $99. Locate the Elite tier pricing card (likely the third tier in the tiers array or JSX structure) and modify the price field to show '$99' while keeping the '/month' suffix and existing styling. Ensure the price change applies only to the Elite tier display without affecting Free or Pro tier prices.
